title: Slutty Costumes and Fear: Why do we love Halloween and Horror?
itunes:title: Slutty Costumes and Fear: Why do we love Halloween and Horror?
itunes:subtitle: Pumpkin spice lattes, apple picking and horror movie season is upon us!
description:
Ever wonder why some folks LOVE Halloween and the start of spooky season? This week Aleena and Madi discuss Madi's favorite holiday of the year. What's the relevance of Halloween? Why do people love the holiday and celebrate it by watching horror films? And really at it's core, why are people obsessed with being scared? Join us as we provide some insight on the history of Halloween, the psychology of fear and the cultural relevance of horror films in the US. We love bringing a bit of light into the darkness (but not too much since Madi likes it a little dark ;) ).
